Gleicy Amorim Macedo

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7712579842033837
  • Última atualização do currículo em 03/02/2015

Gleicy Amorim Macedo , graduated in Biomedicine at Universidade Estadual de Santa Cruz (2006) in Brazil, Master's degree in Infectious and Parasitic Illnesses from Fundação Oswaldo Cruz (2009), concentrated on Dengue Fever Epidemiology, and doctorate in Biomedical Engineering from Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (2014) focused in applying mathematical and statistical models on clinical data from dengue patients. Currently works at National Infectology Institute at FIOCRUZ, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil as a research assistant. Key Areas included: temporal data analysis, epidemiological surveillance, artificial neural network analysis, infectious diseases, data mining, and biostatistics. (Texto informado pelo autor)
